text: Kathleen Mavourneen is a 1906 American silent movie directed by Edwin S. PorterKATHLEEN MAVOURNEENCharles Musser. Before the Nickelodeon: Edwin S. Porter and the Edison Manufacturing Company and stars Kitty O'Neil, Walter Griswoll, and H.L. Bascomb. ==Actors== *Kitty O'Neil as Kathleen *Walter Griswoll as Terence O’More *H.L. Bascomb as Captain Clearfield *W.R. Floyd as Dugan *E.M. Leslie as David O’Connor *N.B. Clarke as Father O’Cassidy *J. McDovall as Danny O’Lavey *C.F. Seabert as Black Rody *D.R. Allen as Red Barney *D.J. McGinnis as Darby Doyle *W.F. Borroughs as Dennis O’Gaff ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:1906 movies Category:American silent movies
title: Kathleen Mavourneen (1906 movie)
